definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: How do you say good- bye to someone you can't imagine living without?
sentences.chinese: 你要如何和你認爲離開了就無法生存的人說再見？

sentences.english: Since I hope to see you again, I'll say au revoir rather than adieu.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我希望再次見你，我將說再見，而非告別。

sentences.english: Good-bye, my sweet heart. I kiss you and the children many thousand times.
sentences.chinese: 再見了，我親愛的，千萬次地吻你和孩子們。

sentences.english: " Our daughter waved and said, "Good-bye, Minnie .
sentences.chinese: 女兒也揮著手說，“再見了，米妮。”

sentences.english: Refuse to you I say goodbye, in the edge of the lei with eyes.
sentences.chinese: 拒絕我說再見，在想你與眼涙的邊緣。

sentences.english: Clouds turn red when the sun says good-bye to her;
sentences.chinese: 到了太陽和它們說再見的時候，雲就變成了紅色。

sentences.english: Therefore, Jay and David said goodbye to each other and promised to get together again on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 因此，阿杰跟戴維彼此告別，並相約週六再見。

sentences.english: Hitoshi was going to say goodbye, but his father cleared his throat.
sentences.chinese: 仁正要說再見，可是他父親清了清嗓子。

sentences.english: Gabriel giggled and waved bye-bye back to him.
sentences.chinese: 蓋布瑞爾喫喫的笑著並回以揮手再見的手勢。

sentences.english: I haven't save your feeling, just facing north say goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 我的挽回你都沒感覺，只是面朝北面說再見。

sentences.english: Yeah, but I still feel sad.Goodbye, Samaranch.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，但是我還是很傷心，再見了，薩馬蘭奇。

sentences.english: Goodbye, when brother again next year to write you.
sentences.chinese: 再見，等明年哥復讀的時候還給你寫。

sentences.english: I hope we meet again soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我們不久能夠再見面。

definition: to leave/to bid farewell to/to say good-bye to
unworthy/to let down/I'm sorry/excuse me/pardon me/if you please/sorry? (please repeat)
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to turn round/to turn one's head/later/by and by
